channel.title: Can't Run
channel.description:
Hi, I dont need help with my server, but I need some help runing a Client... Well, when i try to run a 317 Client, I can play, but just for a few seconds. Then the client crashes, appairs something like this [img]http://img684.imageshack.us/img684/1042/sinttulozc.png[/img] This ever happens. Do I need to install new JRE and JDK??
My versions are: -Java(TM) 6 Update 20 -Java(TM) SE Development Kit 6 Update 20
Please help me THanks =)

item.title: Can't Run
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

Moved to the correct section.

Read full topic

item.title: Can't Run
item.dc:creator: @Project_Evolution Project Evolution
item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

This belongs more in the client hacking section.

Do you have an x86 machine and JDK u18? Try putting this path in your run batch,

"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\javaw.exe"

If that doesnt work, try,

"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\java.exe"

Make sure you change it to your JDK version incase you ar enot using JDK update 18.

Read full topic

item.title: Can't Run
item.dc:creator: @Joeli Joeli
item.description:
@Joeli wrote:

Ok i found how to fix it.
It only happens on Windows 7.
To fix it go http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,425280.0.html
THanks Anyways

Read full topic

Do you mean the text saying this?

@echo off start javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui exit
